SUBNETTING CALCOLO VELOCE

172.14.15.16/17

10101100.00001110.00001111.00010000		(172.14.15.16)
11111111.11111111.10000000.00000000		(255.255.128.000 Subnet Mask)
___________________________________		AND
10101100.00001110.00000000.00000000		(Network ID 172.14.0.0)
10101100.00001110.01111111.11111111		(Broadcast address 172.14.127.255)
